Author: pothosgonerogue
Text: I’m on a med like that. I started taking it during the day so I wouldn’t have to go to bed with 350 calls if I forgot to take it at a “more reasonable” time. I don’t like eating before I sleep, but eating then going to work (my job has a big physical aspect to it) makes more sense for me. It made me a little loopy at first, but as I got used to it everything evened out.   **I spoke with my psych before making the time change.
